short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI tool to scan any webpage and answer your questions based on that webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dread scrolling through websites for research ? Do you find it hard to grasp key points from lengthy resource material ? Try LightScan !

LightScan uses advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to analyze the content of a web page and extract the most relevant information for you. This is especially useful for individuals who frequently read and want to quickly find specific information on a page without having to remember where it was published. It also facilitates the connection of broader themes that may be challenging to grasp through reading alone..

Ask it anything related to the content on the page, and it will provide accurate and concise answers. These answers can be bookmarked chronologically, and copied to rewrite for later use .Whether you need help with research, studying, or just browsing the internet, LightScan has you covered.
